name: Film Stand: Surintendante Chevalmarin
description: An exquisitely made billboard depicting the adorable Surintendante Chevalmarin.\nIt is said that this portrayal of the Surintendante was selected after numerous rounds of voting from fans. There are also plans to make plushies in the Surintendante's image, as well as hanging ornaments and table decorations, to be officially sold at the next convention...
